articles.author: Elizabeth Weise, USA TODAY
articles.title: What if you had your choice of COVID-19 vaccine? Differences are small, but they do exist - Yahoo News
articles.description: If you get the choice, which COVID-19 vaccine should you choose? For now, any one you can get. But supply is growing, and there are differences.
articles.content:
